conclusion: Violation of Art. 5-3;Violation of Art. 6-1 (composition of state security court);Violation of Art. 6-1 (length of proceedings);Not necessary to examine under Art. 6-2 and 6-3-d;Pecuniary and non-pecuniary damage - financial award;Costs and expenses partial award - domestic proceedings;Costs and expenses partial award - Convention proceedings
